centralized.title: Centralized
centralized.feature1: Completely free to play, no need to pay anything
centralized.feature2: You don't have to own any Web 3.0 wallet.
centralized.feature3: We store your password and username in our centralized database
centralized.feature4: In case our API goes down, you wonâ€™t be able to play, compared to other bundles
centralized.feature5: You will see side panel advertisements
centralized.feature6: You will sometimes receive pop-up ads
centralized.feature7: Our MMR to rewards ratio is only 0.5
centralized.feature8: You "only" receive 100% Aexis Pass XP points

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.feature1: Free to play with limited access to premium features
decentralized.feature3: Your account is secured via blockchain authentication
decentralized.feature4: You can continue playing even if our API goes down
decentralized.feature6: You can stake tokens to earn passive rewards
decentralized.feature8: Earn up to 150% Aexis Pass XP points
decentralized.feature9: Ownership of in-game assets as NFTs

vip.title: VIP
vip.feature3: Highest priority in matchmaking and support
vip.feature4: Unlimited access to all premium content
vip.feature5: Access to exclusive VIP events and rewards
vip.feature7: Earn up to 200% Aexis Pass XP points
vip.feature9: Early access to future features and test realms

profile.acceptTOS: By checking this box, you accept our Terms Of Services.
profile.noChangeWarning: You won't be able to change your class or race once you proceed to create your hero
